title: Get Playable
description: An open-source browser extension. Allows you to get links to full-screen playable ads from SensorTower and AppMagic.

title: Video to Playable
description: Converts videos to playable ads. Creating a playable takes just a few minutes with it. Example.

title: Asset Optimizer
description: Uses optimal compression algorithms for images, models, and audio in Cocos Creator. The 5 MB project size limit is no longer a problem!

title: Template
description: A framework for developing playable ads that accelerates work and helps maintain a consistent project style following best practices.
